List.Name: Scam Email Detector
List.Description: This tool detects if an email is a scam or not.
List.BodyText: This tool will detect if an email is a scam or not. To use this tool copy the contents of the supected email and paste them into the box below, then click the "Scan Email" button.
List.InputPlaceholderText: Paste the contents of the suspected email here.

List.Name: Scam Website Detector
List.Description: This tool detects if a suspicious website is a fraudulent or a phising website. Note: Links to an external site

List.Name: Scam Phone Number Detector
List.Description: This tool helps to detect if a phone number is a scam.
List.BodyText: This tool helps to detect if a phone number is a scam. Input a phone number below and click scan to detect whether it is a scam or not. Be sure to include both the country and area code (ex: 11234567890).

List.Name: Fake Guru Detector
List.Description: Detects fake gurus and websites of get rich quick schemes.
List.BodyText: This tool can be used to detect suspected fake gurus by name and / or websites related to fake gurus or get rich quick schemes.
List.InputPlaceholderText: Enter name or URL of website

List.Name: MLM Detector
List.Description: This tool detects if a company is a known MLM / pyramid scheme.
List.BodyText: This tool detects if a company is a known MLM / pyramid scheme.

List.Name: Crypto Scam Detector
List.Description: This tool helps to protect against cryptocurrency scams such as rug pulls. Note: Links to an external site.
